aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: Hi, I'm Anthony
aboutMe.text1: I am a web developer with over a year of experience, specializing in JavaScript, React, Next.js, Astro, Node.js, and databases. My main focus is frontend development, creating modern, responsive, and accessible web interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences.
aboutMe.text2: I also have experience working on fullstack projects and collaborating in multidisciplinary teams. I quickly adapt to new technologies and always strive to bring efficiency and creativity to every project. I graduated with honors from the Technological Institute of the Americas, achieving a 4.0 GPA. I am currently continuing to expand my knowledge through courses and personal projects, staying up to date with the latest technologies.
